Review.Contenu: Consistently experience issues with payments successfully going through their payment system. This causes orders to be put on "hold," which is not always obvious.
Simple, yet powerful, modern looking and sounding VST plugins. There are rough edges around the corners here and there, but overall FAW makes great and useful tools for music production of any kind.

This is a simple operation, but the sound changes in various ways. If you find it difficult to operate, don't hesitate to use the presets.Sublab not just hip-hop. It can be used for various genres of music. I use the 808 as a bass guitar for playing and singing.

I like the plugin.  Aside from some confusion about the crossgrade.  It has been smooth sailing.  THIS PLUGIN IS LOUD AF.  WHICH IS GREAT BUT ALSO BOTHERS ME WHEN GAIN STAGING.  I usually use Phaseplant or Serum for this.  A bit underwhelmed, but COOL!

Review.Titre: Cool software, account management needs work!
Review.Contenu: Software is worth a go, useful and reliable. Still room for improvement in onboarding clients who purchase licenses from third-party vendors :)

Review.Titre: They are working very hard to improve…
Review.Contenu: They are working very hard to improve production , and engineering of audio, and they care about the customers opinion.Great company.
Great product in the making, I see more innovation 💡 coming into play plus AI tech playing a big role in assisting the ever day music innovators.
Good Quality Software, original GUIs and great sound.

Review.Titre: I have 2 synths from FAW and they are…
Review.Contenu: I have 2 synths from FAW and they are both very good, nice gui and looks and great sounding!
great plugin company. sublab xl is boss.

Review.Titre: The quality of sounds perfect for mixes.
It is awesome plugin of 808 ever

Review.Contenu: I use Sublab a lot. I like it very much and i always use it for 808s and subs
i need more presets!
Great Plugin! Unique bass synth.

Review.Titre: BASS IS THE EXHAUST PIPES OF MUSIC!!
Review.Contenu: FROM AD TO PURCHASE TO DELIVERY This has all been a calling to begin now my musical journey. I had been waiting for something out of the box to smash my ears 👂 because bass is like the exhaust of music; no matter how good the sounds of everything else a big bass is the banshee of any good music, that’s a fact and SubBass XL is like an overhaul of the SubBass itself where you’ve giving anyone and everyone the pencil. NOW THE COMPETITION IS FAIR!!

With sublab and sublab xl being my most essential plug-in’s used on nearly every track that I make, there’s potential for problems to arise. Any time I’ve had issues with them not working always due to some thing on my side either got a new computer or upgraded my operating system, etc. I’ve gotten immediate help from staff to keep my production momentum and most importantly my clientele happy. I wish I could say the same for other companies out there. FAW is a rare gem and therefore an absolute asset to my business.

Review.Titre: I love sublab and sublab XL
Review.Contenu: I love sublab and sublab XL. They’re easy to use, cut through the mix smoothly and quite frankly they’re aesthetically pleasing. I haven’t had any issues finding what I need or creating something unique. Unfortunately, I’ve only used Sublab and Sublab XL so I can’t speak on any other products by Future Audio Workshop, but if they’re anything like Sublab I know they’re amazing quality.

Great plugins. Go to for all my 808 and synth bass sound design. Great customer support and regular free updates. Recently had an issue with Sublab no longer being available in my DAWs. It kept crashing during validation after an update was installed. Didn’t really mind because I upgraded to xl but needed to access some older projects so I reached out to customer support. They responded timely with an installer download link that fixed my problem. One of the better experiences I’ve had with plug-in support!

Review.Titre: I think I loved the plugin
Review.Contenu: They said, “Come and see” and I saw!!!  A celestial plugin that deliquesces into the horizon of my productions.  Adds power to the low end that wakes the dormant gods and invokes their essence onto man.  Sprinkling joy and dancing to the sound of EDM while chanting to the song of the Atlantean Space Cats race and pushing towards a new world order by praying for the success of the pilgrimage of Future Audio Workshop’s SubLab plugin take over of the world.

Review.Titre: Sublab XL should be in your top 10 next purchases
Review.Contenu: The title says it like I feel it. Sublab XL is hands down the best sub/bass plugins I have ever owned. It can handle the large majority of my bass needs in my music production. With a generous amount of tools within the plugin to make result fit in your project within minutes. They also offer a buffet of presets from experienced producers that at times will be all that you need. I speak from the experience of buying many plugins that don't even come close to how good Sublab XL performs and sounds.

I've owned around 9 808 style VST's.. I only own 2 now *(see below) SubLabXL and X-eight.. I use SublabXL 90% of the time. The UI is intuitive and it gives you alot more control over your sound design than any other 808 vst out there. There are great Youtube vids out there if you are on the fence. I feel that the vst increased my creativity exponentially. Great purchase that reaped dividends.*I still own the original Sublab I just don't count it since SubLabXL has all my original sounds migrated over.

Review.Titre: FAW is the Future of 808s! No cap.
Review.Contenu: Future Audio Workshop live up to their name. SubLab, SubLab XL are my go to Plugins for Bass & 808s, haven't found any other Plugins like them so far. That shows they're Futuristic, Innovative and Awesome!

being able to shape your samples or using the provided presets is super useful, as sometimes you may have an 808 or bass sounds that you like.. but need to just tweat a bit to fit the tonality of the track SublabXL is the way to go.

Review.Titre: From purchasing the OG SubLab to…
Review.Contenu: From purchasing the OG SubLab to upgrading to SubLabXL everything was a breeze. I've been using SubLab since launch and same with XL. I've never had issues with the plugin, no crashes, no phase issues, nada. The expansion packs are high quality sounds that you can use right out the gate, same with the stock presets. The UI is awesome, simple to use and easy on the eyes. It's these types of designs that inspire me to make sounds and music so I really appreciate it.

Review.Titre: One of the best in the market
Review.Contenu: Very attentive company that search for recommendations from her customers, to give them more of what they want, also a very careful tech support that give answers to their customers in minutes !Also the fact that having a marketing dept that had the time to send stickers and hand written letters to their customers by mail, made them very special to my heart !Attention to detail is not given to all this company’s !They excel in it !

FAW has great products. Getting feedback to improve and provide what makes us buy is important. I have plugins that never get updated which makes me feel like they were one hit wonders. FAW makes good sounding, and great looking plugins that invite me to want to play with them.

Review.Titre: You can tell these guys are really on…
Review.Contenu: You can tell these guys are really on top of what’s going on in the hip-hop industry and they care about making sure you are using relevant sounds. Quality products and good customer support in my experience.

Review.Titre: Sublab and Sublab XL - Ultimate 808 and Bass Go To
Review.Contenu: Great plugin that covers your bass needs. We’re talking 808’s, bass synths, effects and more - cutting edge!  Plenty of room to manipulate sounds to fit your production. I use this plugin on about 90% of every song.

Great company! Would recommend everyone to try their plugins. I own Sublab XL and to be honest don’t need any other sub, base or 808 plug-in after I bought it. The support team is also very kind and helpful.Money well spent with no regrets!// Mohit

Review.Titre: I recently was looking for an 808 that…
Review.Contenu: I recently was looking for an 808 that I could use in a  Pop format and a producer friend of mine suggest I use SubLabXL for this. I never thought about using it that way, but I decided to go for it. The variety of sounds that were available that fit what I was looking for was astonishing. I found the sample I needed and it fit well with the tune I was working on.
If you need some hard hitting Lowend don't look any further, these guys and their plug-ins have done the hard work for you. Best sub generators out there, period.
Circle2 and Sublab are must-have plug-ins for any music producers tool kit! The ease of use and color interface makes these plug-ins a main staple of my production process.

The product - impeccable. Intuitive in nature. Easy to utilize for creativity. Packed with options. Up-to-date. Expansions available. Overall - if you want to work with current sounding synths, implement some FAW.

Review.Titre: A maker of plug-in synths with great interface design.
Review.Contenu: A manufacturer that develops high-quality plug-in synths. Once you get used to the unique interface, it will take you the shortest way to find your ideal sound.

I bought its plugin and was more then satisfied. After this they offers a customer friendly [loyalty] upgrade to version 2. I use both plugin versions now. It is my go-to 808 vst. If you like trap music you will love FAW.
Great software, powerful easy and creative, nice customer support and tutorials. I own all their synths and most expansions and use them extensively. SubLab XL is a must have!

Excellent products, easy to use with amazing sounds and excellent value for the price.The only thing with better value is the Bible, dirt cheap and eternal life guaranteed, what could be better? Plus it comes with Jesus as a free gift. Be blessed

Review.Titre: SubLabXL is my goto for bass
Review.Contenu: SubLabXL is my goto for bass. I really like the interface, the quality of sound and it's not monstrously expensive. There are good expansion packs and the website works well with a visual look that I really like.
I have Circle2, SubLab and it's brother SubLab XL. All of them are incredibly high quality plugins and easy to use. I recommend SubLab/SubLab XL any chance I get to talk about 808 bass.
Faw is one of the top plugin companies in 2023. Their products have beautiful GUI's & they also sound so amazing. U can create your own 808's or use many of their presets....

Review.Titre: Future Audio Workshop is a producer/songwriter's best friend.
Review.Contenu: Future Audio Workshop is where I go when I need new sounds and easy-to-use tools to make music, especially for anything that needs modern bass or 808s.
these are really good synths. modern and clean design. innovative concepts. recommending. circle was the first i own and it is nice to form different sounds.

Review.Titre: Sublab and Sublab XL are very good to…
Review.Contenu: Sublab and Sublab XL are very good to quickly add sub bass to your tracks without any effort. You have amazing presets to chose from and a lot of freedom to make them your own. Or you can do your own sound design if you are brave enough.

Review.Titre: Awesome products and Staff that actually cares to hear feedback…
Review.Contenu: Staff actually cares to hear feedback and seek improvements. Both flagship sublabs are incredible and should be celebrated. Well done!!!
Amazingly small and spunky creative company for those that like the low end and all things different in audio.  Highly recommended!

Review.Titre: I love the FAW plugins because they…
Review.Contenu: I love the FAW plugins because they have helped me to achieve the sound that I was looking for. The sounds generated by FAW plugins sound heavy, realistic and clean.

Review.Titre: The company does very good products…
Review.Contenu: The company does very good products with a fair price. Service was efficient and solved my problems fast. I definitely recommend this company’s products
Great plugins. SubLab and Sublab XL are the state of the art for booming 808 subbass. And the expansion packs are really good additions.

Review.Titre: Definitely have an amazing bass synth
Review.Contenu: Definitely have an amazing bass synth! But did you know, they apparently have more than just SubLab!? Who knew! I'm gonna have to see this for myself!
I like future audio workshop and have been a customer for a few years now. Solid updates, solid content, and reasonable upgrade paths for the latest offerings.

Review.Titre: Purchased SublabXL on special for a…
Review.Contenu: Purchased SublabXL on special for a very cheap price to be very surprised with the professional quality of sound. Highly recommend.
Ease to work with Sublab and Sublab XL, great patches, and if there is an issue it gets resolved fairly quickly
The sound one can produce with SublabXL is versatile and generally can take the bass drum and bass part easily.
Very well designed plugin. Great interface, good sound packs and really great price. It’s really a one stop solution for great bass sound. Recommend!

Review.Titre: SubLab XL you will never run out of ideas!
Review.Contenu: I love SubLab XL it is great for all of your deep suby (that's a word right?) bass needs with a wide variety of sounds and effects you will never get bored!

I own Sublab, Sublab XL and Circle2. All great Sounding Plugins. Support is also great. Quick, friendly Response. They also have a nice community on their site.
